tool_description: The ultimate hosting platform for your HTML5 sites & apps. BitBalloon is all about connecting the elegant simplicity of static sites with the power of the programmable web. Our focus is making it as simple as possible to publish sites that are optimized for performance and leverage the API economy in a meaningful way.
name: BitBalloon
title: BitBalloon

api_list.name: Get records for a zone
api_list.description: GET /dns_zones/{zone_id}/dns_records get a list of dns records

api_list.name: Delete a DNS record
Get Snippet
Get Metadata
api_list.description: GET /sites/{site_id}/metadata get the metadata for a site

api_list.name: Get Users
api_list.description: GET /users get a list users you have access to
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-bitballoon.p.rapidapi.com/users"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-bitballoon.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Files
api_list.description: GET /sites/{site_id}/files will return a list of all the files in the current deploy

api_list.name: Get Deploys
api_list.description: GET /sites/{site_id}/deploys a list of all deploys

api_list.name: Get Deploy
Get DNS Zones
api_list.description: GET /dns_zones get a list of DNS zones

api_list.name: Get Sites
api_list.description: GET /sites will return all sites you have access to.

api_list.name: Get Site
api_list.description: GET /sites/3970e0fe-8564-4903-9a55-c5f8de49fb8b will return the site from its ID GET /sites/www.example.com will return the site matching the domain www.example.com
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-bitballoon.p.rapidapi.com/sites/www.example.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-bitballoon.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://community-bitballoon.p.rapidapi.com/sites/{site}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-bitballoon.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get File
Delete DNS Zone
Get Snippets
api_list.description: GET /sites/{site_id}/snippets get a list of snippets specific to this site (a reseller may set global snippets that won't be included in this list)
